### 2018 Lingdan {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

#### рaсписание
Расписание можно скачать [в формате `.csv`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agricolamz/2018_lingdan_organisation/master/2018_lingdan_calendar.csv) и импортировать в Google Calendar, MS Outlook и т. п.

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(timevis)
df <- read_csv("2018_lingdan_calendar.csv")
df %>% 
  mutate(`Start Date` = dmy_hms(paste(`Start Date`, `Start Time`)),
         id = 1:n(),
         Subject = str_replace_all(Subject, "---", "<br>"),
         Subject = paste0(Subject, "</a> <br>",
                          wday(`Start Date`, label = TRUE))) %>% 
  select("start" = "Start Date", "content" = "Subject") %>% 
  timevis(fit = FALSE)
```
